name: Pipetto and Me: LittleBigHouse Fig Jam
name_original: Pipetto and Me: LittleBigHouse Fig Jam
description:
Sorry for such a short gameplay (Might be long depending if you dont play quite as intended heheh, or depending on the player) The game is tested and can be fully finished, even if ran into the bugs (the bugs in this game just help you anyways)

Hopefully in the future this game will be rebooted and actually done to a longer short game. 

Aswell this is our first gamejam, hope you enjoy the game as much we did creating it! It was a lot of fun!

And being bad at zbrush or mudbox I hope you enjoy Jarle (unreal engine default character) All assets are made by me besides the grass at level1. 

GDN FigJam Theme : Hidden Secerets. 

Game :

WASD - Movement 

F - Interact 

Q - Objectives 

Interaction :

You must get quite close to stuff you want to interact! 

---

Can you find the hidden secerets ?
